maya/beastmayaplugin/src/mayanodes/beastsettingsnode.cpp
/*

#include "mayanodes/beastsettingsnode.h"
#include <maya/MFnEnumAttribute.h>
#include <maya/MFnNumericAttribute.h>
#include <maya/MFnStringData.h>
#include <maya/MFnTypedAttribute.h>
#include "mayanodes/nodeids.h"
#include "mayanodes/nodeenums.h"

namespace beastmaya {

MTypeId BeastSettingsNode::id(ADSK_BEAST_SETTINGS);

MObject BeastSettingsNode::selectionBake;
MObject BeastSettingsNode::useTextureFile;
MObject BeastSettingsNode::maxShaderSamplingResolution;
MObject BeastSettingsNode::texelScale;
MObject BeastSettingsNode::distribution;
MObject BeastSettingsNode::configXml;
MObject BeastSettingsNode::renderQuality;
MObject BeastSettingsNode::maxRayDepth;
MObject BeastSettingsNode::motionBlur;
MObject BeastSettingsNode::motionSteps;
MObject BeastSettingsNode::liveViewRes;
MObject BeastSettingsNode::directScale;
MObject BeastSettingsNode::indirectScale;
MObject BeastSettingsNode::diffuseBoost;
MObject BeastSettingsNode::emissiveScale;
MObject BeastSettingsNode::removeDuplicateTextures;
MObject BeastSettingsNode::liveNoiseReduction;
MObject BeastSettingsNode::causticsMode;

BeastSettingsNode::BeastSettingsNode() {
}

BeastSettingsNode::~BeastSettingsNode() {
}

void BeastSettingsNode::postConstructor() {
        setExistWithoutInConnections(true);
        setExistWithoutOutConnections(true);
}

void* BeastSettingsNode::creator() {
        return new BeastSettingsNode();
}

MStatus BeastSettingsNode::initialize() {
        //
        //      Description:
        //              This method is called to create and initialize all of the attributes
        //      and attribute dependencies for this node type.  This is only called 
        //              once when the node type is registered with Maya.
        //
        //      Return Values:
        //              MS::kSuccess
        //              MS::kFailure
        //              

        MStatus stat;

        // Attribute types
        MFnEnumAttribute nEnumAttr;
        MFnNumericAttribute nNumAttr;
        MFnTypedAttribute  nTypedAttr;
        MFnStringData strData;
        
        selectionBake = nNumAttr.create("selectionBake", "sb", MFnNumericData::kBoolean, false);
        stat = addAttribute(selectionBake);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(stat);

        useTextureFile = nNumAttr.create("useTextureFile", "utf", MFnNumericData::kBoolean, true);
        stat = addAttribute(useTextureFile);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(stat);

        maxShaderSamplingResolution = nNumAttr.create("maxShaderSamplingResolution", "mssr", MFnNumericData::kInt, 256);
        nNumAttr.setMin(1);
        stat = addAttribute(maxShaderSamplingResolution);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(stat);

        texelScale = nNumAttr.create("texelScale", "ts", MFnNumericData::kFloat, 1.0f);
        nNumAttr.setMin(0.0f);
        nNumAttr.setSoftMin(0.0f); nNumAttr.setSoftMax(10.0f);
        stat = addAttribute(texelScale);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(stat);

        distribution = nNumAttr.create("distribution", "d", MFnNumericData::kBoolean, true);
        stat = addAttribute(distribution);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(stat);

        configXml = nTypedAttr.create("configXml", "cx", MFnData::kString, strData.create(""));
        stat = addAttribute(configXml);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(stat);

        renderQuality = nNumAttr.create("renderQuality", "rq", MFnNumericData::kFloat, 0.5f);
        nNumAttr.setMin(0.0f);
        nNumAttr.setMax(1.0f);
        nNumAttr.setSoftMin(0.0f); nNumAttr.setSoftMax(1.0f);
        stat = addAttribute(renderQuality);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(stat);

        maxRayDepth = nNumAttr.create("maxRayDepth", "mrd", MFnNumericData::kInt, 3);
        nNumAttr.setMin(1);
        nNumAttr.setSoftMin(1); nNumAttr.setSoftMax(10);
        stat = addAttribute(maxRayDepth);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(stat);

        motionBlur = nNumAttr.create("motionBlur", "mb", MFnNumericData::kFloat, 0.0f);
        nNumAttr.setMin(0.0f);
        nNumAttr.setSoftMin(0.0f); nNumAttr.setSoftMax(10.0f);
        stat = addAttribute(motionBlur);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(stat);

        motionSteps = nNumAttr.create("motionSteps", "ms", MFnNumericData::kInt, 1);
        nNumAttr.setMin(1);     nNumAttr.setMax(256);
        nNumAttr.setSoftMin(1); nNumAttr.setSoftMax(10);
        stat = addAttribute(motionSteps);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(stat);

        liveViewRes = nNumAttr.create("liveViewRes", "lvr", MFnNumericData::k2Int);
        nNumAttr.setMin(64, 64);
        nNumAttr.setDefault(640, 480);
        stat = addAttribute(liveViewRes);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(stat);

        directScale = nNumAttr.create("directScale", "ds", MFnNumericData::kFloat, 1.0f);
        nNumAttr.setMin(0.0f);
        nNumAttr.setSoftMin(0.0f); nNumAttr.setSoftMax(10.0f);
        stat = addAttribute(directScale);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(stat);

        indirectScale = nNumAttr.create("indirectScale", "is", MFnNumericData::kFloat, 1.0f);
        nNumAttr.setMin(0.0f);
        nNumAttr.setSoftMin(0.0f); nNumAttr.setSoftMax(10.0f);
        stat = addAttribute(indirectScale);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(stat);

        diffuseBoost = nNumAttr.create("diffuseBoost", "db", MFnNumericData::kFloat, 1.0f);
        nNumAttr.setMin(0.0f);
        nNumAttr.setSoftMin(0.0f); nNumAttr.setSoftMax(10.0f);
        stat = addAttribute(diffuseBoost);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(stat);

        emissiveScale = nNumAttr.create("emissiveScale", "es", MFnNumericData::kFloat, 1.0f);
        nNumAttr.setMin(0.0f);
        nNumAttr.setSoftMin(0.0f); nNumAttr.setSoftMax(10.0f);
        stat = addAttribute(emissiveScale);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(stat);

        removeDuplicateTextures = nNumAttr.create("removeDuplicateTextures", "rdt", MFnNumericData::kBoolean, true);
        stat = addAttribute(removeDuplicateTextures);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(stat);

        liveNoiseReduction = nEnumAttr.create(L"liveNoiseReduction", L"lnr", LIVE_NOISE_REDUCTION_HIGH);
        nEnumAttr.addField(L"None", LIVE_NOISE_REDUCTION_NONE);
        nEnumAttr.addField(L"Low", LIVE_NOISE_REDUCTION_LOW);
        nEnumAttr.addField(L"Medium", LIVE_NOISE_REDUCTION_MEDIUM);
        nEnumAttr.addField(L"High", LIVE_NOISE_REDUCTION_HIGH);
        stat = addAttribute(liveNoiseReduction);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(stat);

        causticsMode = nEnumAttr.create(L"causticsMode", L"cm", CMT_NONE);
        nEnumAttr.addField(L"None", CMT_NONE);
        nEnumAttr.addField(L"Some", CMT_SOME);
        nEnumAttr.addField(L"All", CMT_ALL);
        stat = addAttribute(causticsMode);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(stat);

        return MS::kSuccess;
}

MStatus BeastSettingsNode::compute( const MPlug& plug, MDataBlock& data ) {
        //
        //      Description:
        //              This method computes the value of the given output plug based
        //              on the values of the input attributes.
        //
        //      Arguments:
        //              plug - the plug to compute
        //              data - object that provides access to the attributes for this node
        //
        return MS::kSuccess;
}

bool BeastSettingsNode::canBeDeleted(bool isSrcNode) {
        return false;
}

}
